title: Civil unions
context: [ยง88-1.2] Civil unions. For the purposes of this chapter, the terms &ldquo;married&rdquo;, &ldquo;marriage&rdquo;, &ldquo;marital&rdquo;, &ldquo;husband&rdquo;, &ldquo;wife&rdquo;, or similar spousal terms shall include civil union partners and civil unions under chapter 572B, unless recognition of a civil union as a marriage conflicts with the requirements for the system to be a tax-qualified plan under section 401(a) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended. [L 2013, c 123, ยง2]
